messages.subject: Re: Astronomy Picture of the Day
messages.msgSnippet: I love this site, thanks so much for sharing.  Me and my son started our homeschooling/unschooling adventure last fall pouring over the astronomy info.  I
messages.messageBody:
I love this site, thanks so much for sharing. Me and my son started our
homeschooling/unschooling adventure last fall pouring over the astronomy
info. I think we both learned a lot. This looks like a sight to be checked
every day. Cool.
Chelle the desert dweller


In a message dated 1/12/00 4:50:42 PM Pacific Standard Time, kgale@...
writes:

> I just recently found this site that has a new, wonderful photo
> every day. For those hs/unschoolers who are interested in astronomy,
> a wealth of information can be had here! There are archives to view
> the photographs of past days.
> check it out here: http://antwrp.gsfc.nasa.gov/apod

messages.subject: Astronomy Picture of the Day
messages.msgSnippet: Hi I just recently found this site that has a new, wonderful photo every day.  For those hs/unschoolers who are interested in  astronomy, a wealth of
messages.messageBody:
Hi

I just recently found this site that has a new, wonderful photo
every day. For those hs/unschoolers who are interested in astronomy,
a wealth of information can be had here! There are archives to view
the photographs of past days. I think it is an exciting site
-if only to see the beauty.

check it out here: http://antwrp.gsfc.nasa.gov/apod

Karol
